entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Trim Analyzer and Trimmer warning parity #101149
  • Trim analyzer doesn't recognize Linq Expressions translations #101148
    Future
  • [API Proposal] Create ReadOnlySpanMarshaller<T, TUnmanaged>.ManagedToUnmanagedOut marshaller #101136
    9.0.0
  • Generic dictionary lookup race condition on expansion due to JIT codegen issue #101131
    9.0.0
  • Remove COM attributes from interfaces modified by trimming #101128
  • [API Proposal]: ContainerConfiguration WithAssemblies Retains the Actual Collection; and Can Become Cleared #101126
  • Expose content length decoder on AsnDecoder #101125
    9.0.0
  • Dotnet build hangs while building libs.tests natively using cross built dotnet sdk #101121
  • [browser] WS + HTTP tests are failing under Firefox #101115
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 22 Regressions on 4/8/2024 7:16:22 PM #101127
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 11 Regressions on 4/8/2024 6:26:42 PM #101124
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 4 Regressions on 4/11/2024 11:29:08 PM #101134
  • .NET 9.0 Preview 3 crashes SkiaSharp 3.0 in Release mode (possible ICU / Globalization problem) #101107
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Wasm linux/windows HighResource LibrariestTests AOT are failing on build #101104
    9.0.0
  • Dataflow analysis models result of `newobj` as MultiValueLattice.Top #101102
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: PlatformNotSupportedException: Blocking wait is not supported on the JS interop threads #101100
    9.0.0
  • GetLoadLevel() postcondition failure #101096

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Failed to create generic virtual method implementation #101043
  • [API Proposal]: Allow adding links after activity creation #101146
  • Determine the strategy that should be used by the Jit when folding implementation-defined casts #47478
    9.0.0
  • Ping class acts differently on Linux vs Windows #99838
    9.0.0
  • Ping class responding Timedout not reading response when ICMP Time-to-live exceeded. #73232
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 9 Regressions on 3/11/2024 6:43:09 PM #99770
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions on 2/27/2024 9:28:58 PM #99124
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions on 1/6/2024 11:51:20 AM #96697
    9.0.0
  • Loop Invariant Cause of Perf Drops Of System.Collections.IndexerSet<String>.Span(Size: 512) #94161
    9.0.0
  • dotnot-host installer not found on system, cannot repair, install, fix or upgrade #98286
  • [API Proposal]: DefaultInitializeAttribute for out parameters in native marshallers #98049
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal] Add APIs that needed for emitting symbols with reflection emit PersistedAssemblyBuilder #99935
    9.0.0
  • TimeZoneInfo for Antarctica/Casey has incorrect data #101111
  • [API Proposal]: Add the ability to specify line endings when serializing Json #84117
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT crashes on macOS arm64 during `StackFrameIterator::CalculateCurrentMethodState` #100919
  • Getting intermittent 403 while making HttpPost call using Client Certificate Authentication in .net6 #99812
  • [browser] Enabling WasmStripILAfterAOT breaks app with 'NIY encountered' and results in larger build size #92238
    9.0.0
  • Package support for Azure Linux 3.0 #100557
  • [wasm] perf pipeline clang crashes on PERFTIGER200 #88148
  • Matcher.Match(string) regression between 8.0.0 and 9.0.0 Preview 1 #100762
    9.0.0
  • Inconsistent namespace declarations in XElement. #100940
  • ThreadLocal IsValueCreated Returns True Forever; Even With No Factory #101105
  • [HTTP/3] System.Net.Quic.QuicException: The connection timed out from inactivity #94507
    9.0.0
  • QUIC: MsQuicListener can randomly fail to accept new connection #55979
    9.0.0
  • ReadAsStreamAsync_HandlerProducesWellBehavedResponseStream test failure on release coreclr windows x64 Debug CI leg #97259
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] WebSocketClient_ResponseCloseInDifferentThread #100931
    9.0.0
  • How to change the position of Hamburger menu icon - .Net 8 Maui #101112
  • KESTREL System.InvalidOperationException: Handle is already used by another Socket. #99348
  • JIT incorrectly reorders constrained call 'this' indirections with other arguments #73615
    9.0.0
  • Attributes taking object as a parameter have unexpected behavior in AOT #100688
  • Error: "Undefined symbols for architecture arm64: _SSLClose" when building projects to iPad #101005
  • Assemblies returned from AppDomain.AssemblyResolve are checked for matching strong name #101029
  • unix/windows commands are mixed in helix run script #101050
  • ilasm do not handle the "/mdv" command line option #101052
  • Process.Start fails to execute properly #25057
  • WebSocket client uses a pool on Linux, long reconnect delays #29891
  • WebClient ResponseHeaders.HasKeys() returns incorrect result #27971
  • Native AOT build fails on Ubuntu 22.04 and Clang 14.0.0-1ubuntu1.1 with error : cannot find -lstdc++: No such file or directory #93317
  • windows .net core console hang on unhandled exception #97496
  • [API Proposal]: Add BinaryPrimitives Single and Double support to .NET standard 2.1 #101085
  • [NativeAOT] Trivial use of Delegate.Method is not enabling delegate targets for reflection #101026
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix missing explicit frame pop on arm32 #101147
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Avoid rooting X509Certificate2 in SslSessionCache #101144
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [PERF] Move performance testing logic into python scripts #101143
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add AsnDecoder {Try}DecodeLength #101141
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [browser] rename WasmTestOnChrome #101140
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Only add interface methods to _virtual_methods cache #101139
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser] easy prep for Firefox #101138
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix regression from RuntimeType.AllocateValueType rewrite #101137
    needs-area-label
  • Avoid some defensive copies on readonly structs in System.Net.Quic #101133
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Use likelihoods in block reordering decision #101132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Run DependencyInjection trimming tests as native AOT. #101129
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Revert "Add params ReadOnlySpan<T> overloads" #101123
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Add basic support for Swift reverse pinvokes #101122
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V] New ABI classifiers #101114
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm] Fix AOT publish in paths with space on Windows #101109
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Fix function signature mismatch in m2n invoke #101106
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [S390x] Fix stack offset size while passing structure as argument. #101103
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Update System.Threading.Channels dependency #101101
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #101099
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #101098
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • [PERF] Remove lttng-modules-dkms package at beginning of microbenchmark runs #101142
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] [release/8.0] Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to latest #101145
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.5
  • [release/8.0] Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to latest #100595
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.5
  • Avoid rooting X509Certificate2 in SslSessionCache #101120
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add option to keep/remove COM interfaces #101087
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • fix ping with TTL on Linux #99875
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use likelihood-based edge weights #99736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't ignore the case when dataflow doesn't know what's going on #101031
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update Mariner 2.0 to Azure Linux 3.0 #100942
    area-Infrastructure
  • Set `out` parameters to default instead of using SkipInit in Interop generators #101076
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add PDB support for PersistedAssemblyBuilder #100706
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add new line to be specified for JSON formatting #100890
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Assert JitInterface doesn't receive generic parameters #101108
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Globbing - Use GetFullPath for normalization on relative files #101083
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, 9.0.0
  • [browser] System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript change should trigger full wasm run #101113
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Disable SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_MaxResponseHeadersLength_Http3 Test Suite #101110
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Run MsQuic tests in parallel. #100947
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser] dont trim fail fast message #101056
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix .Wait in CompleteTask #101078
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix constrained call dereferences happening too early #86638
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Generate custom attributes from metadata instead of type system #100763
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure Array.CreateInstance for reference types works #101048
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasi] Debug missing wasmtime #100664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Ignore strongname mismatch for assemblies returned by AssemblyResolve event #101039
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix helix os detection #101077
    area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Build CoreLib as AnyCPU #101084
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix ilasm /mdv option #101086
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #101091
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #101092
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #101093
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow

Updated

  • [mono] simdhash tweaks #101082
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [cdac] Make DAC load and use cDAC when available #100946
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Move profile checking back until just before inlining #101011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove more helper frames #100939
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Insert a breakpoint instruction after throwing calls #101037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expand host_runtime_contract to include the entry assembly and probing paths #100503
    area-Host
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement a JSON contract reader #100966
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Un-revert ratelimiting change #97041
    area-System.Threading
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Create ReadOnlySpan marshaller for ManagedToUnmanagedOut scenarios #101095
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Weak interior handles #100446
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #100810
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove Win7 Helix queues #100985
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.6
  • [release/7.0-staging] Remove Win7 Helix queues #100986
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] Remove Windows 7 helix queues #100988
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.31
  • Adjust the calleeSavedRegs on top frame for LoongArch64/RISCV64 #100962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [PERF][Release/8.0] Update queues. #101094
    area-Infrastructure
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Return type from exact method context for call returns #100041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: Model JIT helper exceptions correctly in VN #101062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added SIMD path for Vector3, Quaternion and Matrix4x4 operations #99547
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Update EOL versions in release/8.0-staging #101073
    needs-area-label
  • Fix running tests with process isolation under naot #100331
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Merge #91634 into release/8.0 #100994
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Refresh cached credentials after PreAuthenticate fails #101053
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [WIP] Update entry assembly #100935
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement ConditionalSelect API #100718
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 123.0.6312.122, windows: 123.0.6312.122 #101017
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add some TODO #5213 comments #100954
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add CreateWhileLessThan* #100949
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Changed GetNetworkInterfaces method to to retrieve information related to all interfaces #100824
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Console.Unix: revert SetWindowSize implementation. #100272
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #100427
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution

    documentation, area-Meta
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: package publishing broken #2539

PullRequests

Created

  • Update parser and emitter to support nested Swift types #2548
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build break after VS updates .NET SDK and rebuild without restore #40228
  • FileSystemWatcher limited to a single filespec filter. #40220
  • .NET 6.0.28 unable find pkg Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host.ubuntu.22.04-x64 #40217
  • [dotnet watch] Replace DotNetWatch.targets with ProjectGraph traversal #40214
    Backlog
  • [NETE2ESDK][MAC]Fail to test xunit/mstest project with NET 9 preview.4 SDK installed. #40194
  • DirectoryNotFoundException - Throws Misleading Exception When Path to File is Provided Instead of Directory #40192
  • Is wasm-tools workload supported in dotnet SDK docker image for armv7? #40190

PullRequests

Created

  • Add repository policy to label and close stale issues #40226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CentOS tags in 8.0.3xx #40216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CentOS tags in 8.0.4xx #40212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CentOS tags in 8.0.1xx #40211
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CentOS tags in 6.0.1xx #40210
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CentOS tags in 6.0.4xx #40209
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable a bunch of container tests #40191
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, 8.0.3xx
  • Remove PublishTestResults task on Helix testing jobs #40213
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #40187
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • 4xx branding #40138
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • delete nonexistent feeds #40067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Correct arguments passed to the subcommand in presence of -- #40120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Merge dotnet/Installer `src` and `test` folder histories #40084
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Update target branch #40145
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update loc branch target #40147
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Request silent restore for all separate restore steps #40148
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow 'Add project reference' for existing projects #40133
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [Static Web Assets] Introduce static web asset endpoints and define compression endpoints #39636
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [Wasm] Remove workarounds #39689
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Relax `Add` requirement for collection expression conversions to types implementing `IEnumerable` #8034
  • Proposal: Exponentiation operator #2585
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Support generics and generic type parameters in aliases #1239
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Overload Resolution Priority #7706
  • [Proposal]: Self Constraint #5413
    Likely Never

PullRequests

Created

  • Clarify "Delegate type for the anonymous function or method group" section in ref-struct-interfaces.md #8058
  • Update ref-in-async speclet #8056

Merged

  • Update README.md #8057

Updated

  • Add proposal for partial type inference #7582

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expose Roslyn protocol types as binary dependency to Xaml, Razor #73055
  • Unexpected SemanticModel responses related to ValueTuples when it involves a nullable element #73052
  • Add SymbolDisplayGenericsOptions.IncludeArity as an alternative to SymbolDisplayGenericsOptions.IncludeTypeParameters #73051
  • Followup work to consider after removing ForegroundThreadAffinitizedObject #73048
  • The "Extract method" refactoring should recognize primary constructor parameters #73044
    Backlog

Closed

  • Cannot intercept conditional access or pointer member access invocations #72478
    17.11
  • Rich copy/paste of C# source code into Office fails in the latest Visual Studio preview #71099
    17.11 P1
  • Unexpected IL in record's "PrintMembers" for an unconstrained type parameter. #73041
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34815.147 #73038
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-34815.163 #73037

PullRequests

Created

  • Port https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/72964 to release/dev17.10 #73058
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use a simpler pattern when working with stacks #73057
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to an explicit stack to avoid stack overflow when computing tree equivalence #73056
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to an iterative approach to determining next sibling in the blender #73054
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Add new support for RegisterSemanticModelStartAction #73053
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Add comment for max lambda binding value #73050
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Followup work to handle ForegroundThreadAffinitizedObject removal. #73049
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Nullable analysis of conditional operator should use best common type unless target typed #73047
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Replace deprecated CI image #73043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix pool image #73042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up Razor EA #73040
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Specially handle some scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73025
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Edit and continue diagnostic source #72787
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Support intercepting invocation within conditional access #72998
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Do not report exception message in fault details #73034
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move Replay tool to the proper folder in solution explorer #72846
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Only trigger corehost integration tests on supported release branches #73039
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Move off of ForegroundThreadAffinitizedObject #73029
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix flaky lsp mutating request tests #73036
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Don't load copilot assemblies if user's not logged in #73035
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, 17.11
  • Warn for `yield return` in `lock` #72755
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async

Updated

  • Fix a couple of issues with extension lookup/binding #72848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Implement Lookup APIs on extensions #72948
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • WIP: Sync solution contents consistently #72860
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix issue in editor config filepath comparison #73033
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11
  • Avoid asserting unvisited nested binary operators #72935
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer (#68469) #73008
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix Double-to-Long overflow check #73016
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.11

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NavigationManager different behavior on WebAssembly since 8.0.3 #55171
  • Perf regression: single_query #55168
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, plaintext #55167
  • Expose more groups features in signalR #55165
  • `shadowrootmode` attribute does not work in Blazor files #55164
    Backlog
  • Identity: `IdentityOptions` should be inside an `IOptionsSnapshot` #55162
  • Exception middlewares introduce duplicates of error.type diagnostic tags in some situations #55159
  • Perf improvement: single_query #55156

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55130
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #55149
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Enhanced Navigation DOM Patching Algorithm and Link Elements #54250
    9.0-preview4
  • Questions about Blazor component disposal #55082
  • Chrome 123.0.6312.123 throws errors when accessing InteractiveServer applications #55085
  • how intercept the enhanced navigation calls and show & hide a loader for enhanced navigation #55128
  • Setting DefaultSlidingExpiration inside AddDistributedSqlServerCache does not work. Default 1200s still used. #55158
  • You broke Blazor with RenderMode #55104
  • ValueTask EventCallback Support #55154
  • addCascadingValue consumed from a library extension method acts as a singleton in Blazor Web App #55125
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #55123
  • SignalR MaximumParallelInvocationsPerClient only run on one thread #54836

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure OutputCaching generates a documentation file #55170
    area-middleware
  • Ensuring deleted cookies are recognized by the browser by ensuring the MaxAge within CookieOptions is set to null. #55169
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Per-page opt out from interactive routing #55157
    area-blazor
  • update project templates package reference #55155
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update Wix version #55088
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • [release/6.0] Update Wix version #55103
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.30
  • Add support for generating OpenAPI request bodies #55040
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Support enhanced nav updates to link tag integrity #55163
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Enable building native projects for windows arm64 #55145
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Condition RIDs on which target RIDs are available when doing a VMR build #55172
    area-networking
  • [Blazor] Use JSON source generator during WebAssembly startup #54956
    area-blazor
  • Removing noReload argument from WebDriverExtensions.Nagivate #55143
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add amendable OverscanCount parameter to the QuickGrid for virtualization. #55078
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Using SearchValues in ContentDispositionHeaderValue #55039
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Switch to dnceng pool for SDL tasks #55090
    area-infrastructure
  • Implement minimal implementation of HybridCache #55147
    area-networking
  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-routing
  • Change how ANCM recycles app #52807
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Change how the key ring cache is updated #54675
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Allow retries in DefaultKeyResolver.CanCreateAuthenticatedEncryptor #54711
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebView loading issue #21870
  • issue running tutorial #21869
  • Android: Image Translations offset Image but not Background or Touchable area #21868
  • Setting PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation does not affect Status Bar Hiding Animation #21866
  • Consider marking INativeBindingService as Obsolete #21861
    .NET 9 Planning
  • DatePicker not respecting UserAppTheme #21858
  • MAUI CollectionView causes to crash app on both IOS and Android #21855
  • Memory leak when using shell navigation on Android #21853
    Backlog
  • When an image is used for a IconImageSource all images are using the theme or a different color than the one originally assigned in the .svg after that #21852

Closed

  • items in flyout are transparent #21865
  • Throwing in a background thread freezes the UI when debugging #21741
  • [WinUI] Crash involving `ObservableCollection` and `ContentView` #21860
  • DesignMode.IsDesignModeEnabled always returns true when in Debug (with Hot Reload enabled?), breaking OrientationStateTrigger #21776
  • [.Net 8] Bindable Properties Initialization with default new() #21831
  • Cannot run Debug build on iOS simulator #21811
  • Switches should have their own options to Color their Thumb and Tint for state On/Off #21817
  • Spurious `XFC0040` errors. #21848
  • How to change the position of Hamburger menu icon - .Net 8 Maui #21854
  • Compile-time binding of BindingContext should use the inherited x:DataType #21434
  • Going back using 'Shell.Current.GoToAsync("..")' causes a crash, but only when using a Mouse on an Android. #19461
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #21867

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Breaking Change in 8.0.4: System.InvalidOperationException: The data is NULL at ordinal 0. This method can't be called on NULL values. Check using IsDBNull before calling. #33547
  • IQueryable support for Union #33546
  • Reuse existing value of a complex property / owned type #33545
  • Is it possible to opt into faster value reads by skipping null checks? #33544
  • SQLite provider returns 'different' decimal values from SqlServer. #33543

Closed

  • Projection loads unneeded properties #33538
  • Entity mapped to JSON returns different byte[] when not the whole entity is projected #33435
    9.0.0
  • How to check if LINQ query will be translated to one or multiple SQL queries/statements when using AsSplitQuery in application runtime, before executing query in database #33530

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix parameter names for nested types in complex type equality (#33527) #33548

Merged

  • Transform JSON_VALUE() to OPENJSON/WITH for binary/varbinary #33440
  • Fix parameter names for nested types in complex type equality #33527

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • RIDs are now a bad pattern to identify a distro + version #19284

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #19493
  • Enable building "non-official" VMR builds #19491
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #19490
  • Pass RepositoryName as a build argument in SourceBuild #19480

Merged

  • Revert "Revert "Make SDK previews be in the preview.0 band"" #19300
  • Use the repo asset manifests to discover dependency versions #19389

Updated

  • Enable efcore in the VMR build #19313
  • Publish PRs for Source-Build Test Results #19434
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1224: Build ID 2431778 #19344
  • Add Join-Verticals task, use it at the final Join Point #19369
  • Update-eol-versions-8.0.1xx #19318
  • 4xx branding #19443
  • Update table #19447
  • Add Unified Build produced NuGet package validation against official build #19304
